original: Milindapañha
analyzed: milindapañha

original: Meṇḍakapañha
analyzed: meṇḍakapañha

original: Sabbaññutañāṇavagga
analyzed: sabbaññuta ñāṇa vagga

original: 1 Iddhikammavipākapañha
analyzed: iddhi kamma vipāka pañha

original: “Bhante nāgasena, bhāsitampetaṁ bhagavatā—
analyzed: bhante nāgasena bhāsitam petam bhagavatā

original: ‘etadaggaṁ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ iddhimantānaṁ yadidaṁ mahāmoggallāno’ti.
analyzed: etat agga bhikkhave mama sāvakānam bhikkhūnam iddhimantānam yat idam mahā moggallāno ti

original: Puna ca kira so laguḷehi paripothito bhinnasīso sañcuṇṇitaṭṭhimaṁsadhamanichinnaparigatto parinibbuto.
analyzed: puna ca kira saḥ laguḷehi paripothitaḥ bhinna sīsaḥ parinibbutaḥ

original: Yadi, bhante nāgasena, thero mahāmoggallāno iddhiyā koṭiṁ gato, tena hi laguḷehi pothito parinibbutoti yaṁ vacanaṁ, taṁ micchā.
analyzed: yadi bhante nāgasena theraḥ mahāmoggallānaḥ iddhiyā koṭim gataḥ tena hi laguḷehi pothitaḥ parinibbutaḥ iti yam tam micchā

original: Yadi laguḷehi paripothito parinibbuto, tena hi iddhiyā koṭiṁ gatoti tampi vacanaṁ micchā.
analyzed: yadi laguḷehi paripothitaḥ parinibbutaḥ tena hi iddhiyā koṭim gataḥ ti tat pi vacanam micchā

original: Kiṁ na samattho iddhiyā attano upaghātaṁ apanayituṁ, sadevakassapi lokassa paṭisaraṇaṁ bhavituṁ arahoti?
analyzed: kim na samatthaḥ iddhiyā attanaḥ upaghātam apanayitu sa devakassa api lokassa paṭisaraṇam bhavitum araho ti

original: Ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho tavānuppatto, so tayā nibbāhitabbo”ti.
analyzed: ayam pi ubhatas koṭikaḥ pañho tava anuppatto saḥ tayā nibbāhitabbaḥ ti

original: “Bhāsitampetaṁ, mahārāja, bhagavatā—
analyzed: mahā rāja bhagavatā

original: ‘etadaggaṁ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ iddhimantānaṁ yadidaṁ mahāmoggallāno’ti.
analyzed: etat agga bhikkhave mama sāvakānam bhikkhūnam iddhimantānam yat idam mahā moggallāno ti

original: Āyasmā ca mahāmoggallāno laguḷahato parinibbuto, tañca pana kammādhiggahitenā”ti.
analyzed: āyasmā ca mahāmoggallānaḥ laguḷahato parinibbuto tat ca pana kamma adhiggahitena ati

original: “Nanu, bhante nāgasena, iddhimato iddhivisayopi kammavipākopi dve acintiyā, acintiyena acintiyaṁ apanayitabbaṁ.
analyzed: nanu bhante nāgasena iddhimataḥ iddhi visayaḥ api kamma vipākaḥ api dve acintiyāḥ acintiyena acintiyam

original: Yathā nāma, bhante, keci phalakāmā kapitthena kapitthaṁ pothenti, ambena ambaṁ pothenti;
analyzed: yathā nāma bhante keci phala kāmā kapitthena kapittham pothenti ambena ambam pothenti

original: evameva kho, bhante nāgasena, acintiyena acintiyaṁ pothayitvā apanetabban”ti?
analyzed: evam eva kho bhante nāgasena acintiyena acintiyam pothayitvā apanetabbanti

original: “Acintiyānampi, mahārāja, ekaṁ adhimattaṁ balavataraṁ.
analyzed: acintiyānam pi mahā rāja ekam adhimattam balavatara

original: Yathā, mahārāja, mahiyā rājāno honti samajaccā, samajaccānampi tesaṁ eko sabbe abhibhavitvā āṇaṁ pavatteti;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja mahiyāḥ rājānaḥ honti tesam ekaḥ sabbe abhibhavitvā āṇam pavatteti

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, tesaṁ acintiyānaṁ kammavipākaṁyeva adhimattaṁ balavataraṁ,
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja tesam a cintiyānam kamma vipākayā iva adhimattam balavatara

original: kammavipākaṁ yeva sabbe abhibhaviya āṇaṁ pavatteti, kammādhiggahitassa avasesā kiriyā okāsaṁ na labhanti.
analyzed: kamma vipākam yā iva sabbe abhibhaviya āṇam pavatteti kamma adhiggahitassa avasesā kiriyā okāsam na labhanti

original: Idha pana, mahārāja, koci puriso kismiñcideva pakaraṇe aparajjhati, na tassa mātā
analyzed: idha pana mahā rāja koci puriso kismiñcid eva pakaraṇe aparajjhati na tassa mātā

original: vā pitā vā bhaginī vā bhātaro vā sakhī vā sahāyakā vā tāyanti, atha kho rājāyeva
analyzed: vā pitā vā bhaginī vā bhātaraḥ vā sakhī vā sahāyakāḥ vā tāyanti atha khalu rājāya iva

original: tattha abhibhaviya āṇaṁ pavatteti.
analyzed: tattha abhibhaviya āṇam pavatteti

original: Kiṁ tattha kāraṇaṁ?
analyzed: kim tattha kāraṇa

original: Aparādhikatā.
analyzed: apara adhika tā

original: Evameva kho, mahārāja, tesaṁ acintiyānaṁ kammavipākaṁyeva adhimattaṁ balavataraṁ,
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja tesam a cintiyānam kamma vipākayā iva adhimattam balavatara

original: kammavipākaṁyeva sabbe abhibhaviya āṇaṁ pavatteti, kammādhiggahitassa avasesā kiriyā okāsaṁ na labhanti.
analyzed: kamma vipākayā iva sabbe abhibhaviya āṇam pavatteti kamma adhiggahitassa avasesā kiriyā okāsam na labhanti

original: Yathā vā pana, mahārāja, mahiyā davaḍāhe samuṭṭhite ghaṭasahassampi udakaṁ na sakkoti nibbāpetuṁ, atha kho aggiyeva tattha abhibhaviya āṇaṁ pavatteti.
analyzed: yathā vā pana mahā rāja mahiyā davaḍāhe samuṭṭhite ghaṭa sahassam pi udakam na sakkoti nibbāpetu atha kho aggiyā iva tattha abhibhaviya āṇam pavatteti

original: Kiṁ tattha kāraṇaṁ?
analyzed: kim tattha kāraṇa

original: Balavatā tejassa.
analyzed: balavatā tejaḥ sa

original: Evameva kho, mahārāja, tesaṁ acintiyānaṁ kammavipākaṁ yeva adhimattaṁ balavataraṁ,
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja tesam acintiyānam kamma vipākam yā iva adhimattam balavatara

original: kammavipākaṁyeva sabbe abhibhaviya āṇaṁ pavatteti, kammādhiggahitassa avasesā kiriyā
analyzed: kamma vipākayā iva sabbe abhibhaviya āṇam pavatteti kamma adhiggahitassa avasesā kiriyā

original: okāsaṁ na labhanti, tasmā, mahārāja, āyasmato mahāmoggallānassa kammādhiggahitassa
analyzed: okāsam na labhanti tasmai mahā rāja āyasmataḥ mahāmoggallānassa kamma adhiggahitassa

original: laguḷehi pothiyamānassa iddhiyā samannāhāro nāhosī”ti.
analyzed: laguḷehi pothiyamānassa iddhiyā samannāhāraḥ

original: “Sādhu, bhante nāgasena, evametaṁ tathā sampaṭicchāmī”ti.
analyzed: sādhu bhante nāgasena evam etam tathā sampaṭicchāmi iti

original: Iddhikammavipākapañho paṭhamo.
analyzed: iddhi kamma vipāka pañho paṭhamo
